favourite.article: No excuses to NOT praise Him!
Enjoyable, fresh and heavenly. Excuse me whilst I praise my Father. Hallelujah thank You Father for this song. A gift from your Heart to your God-man to enjoy.
Praise the Lord! We have an excuse to praise our God and Father!
We are enjoying this in Brisbane Australia! :) Praising the Lord now :)

Yes! I know that He is and He loves me so! Glory to our GOD! We bless YOU our GOD & FATHER! GOD & FATHER! This is the first hymn, song our 3 year old sonny danced (we never taught him to dance:)) first time and still loves to dance under and sing:)
I don't always have a good excuse, but when I do it's to praise the Lord!

"Praise the Lord! Praise the Lord! I will bless the God and Father Praise the Lord! Praise the Lord! Of my Lord Jesus Christ Praise the Lord! Praise the Lord! I will praise while I have breath Because I know that He is and I have breath now." So glad this hymn is on here now! Saints may we keep praising Him all our days!!! He is worthy of all praise no matter the circumstances! Hallelujah!
